attributes.action: organise an immediate withdrawal of British troops from Iraq
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Opinion polls show a majority of the British and Iraqi public want an end to the occupation of Iraq by British and US forces. It's time to bow to public opinion and bring the troops home.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "organise an immediate withdrawal of British troops from Iraq."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12260.asp

Prime Minister's Office
